quote: A dying culture invariably exhibits personal rudeness. Bad manners. Lack of consideration for others in minor matters. A loss of politeness, of gentle manners, is more significant than is a riot.
quote_letters: A DYING CULTURE INVARIABLY EXHIBITS PERSONAL RUDENESS BAD MANNERS LACK OF CONSIDERATION FOR OTHERS IN MINOR MATTERS A LOSS OF POLITENESS OF GENTLE MANNERS IS MORE SIGNIFICANT THAN IS A RIOT
